item.title: 以色列风投公司称金融科技行业将在2026年持续复苏
item.description: 以色列科技投资集团Viola Ventures周二在一份报告中指出，全球金融科技行业将在2025年从三年低迷中强劲复苏后，于2026年继续走向成熟。【原文：The global financial technology sector will continue to mature in 2026 after recovering sharply in 2025 from a three-year downturn, Israeli technology investment group Viola Ventures said in a report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将扩大当日达服务，并在全食超市扩张计划中关闭部分门店
item.description: 亚马逊周二表示，今年将把当日达服务扩展至更多城市，同时关闭部分亚马逊Go和亚马逊生鲜实体店，将其改造为全食超市门店。【原文：Amazon said on Tuesday it would expand its same-day delivery service to more cities this year while closing some of its Amazon Go and Amazon Fresh physical locations to convert them into Whole Foods super market stores.】

item.title: WhatsApp推出高安全模式，成为最新一家为用户提供更强保护的技术公司
item.description: Meta旗下的WhatsApp即时通讯服务正向用户提供高级安全模式，加入了越来越多允许用户选择更强保护以抵御黑客攻击的美国科技公司行列——尽管这会带来更受限制的使用体验。【原文：Meta's WhatsApp messaging service is offering users an advanced security mode, joining a growing number of U.S. tech firms that are letting users opt into stronger protections against hackers in exchange for a more restrictive experience.】

item.title: 美国联邦住房金融局称11月独栋住宅价格大幅上涨
item.description: 美国单户住宅价格在11月加速上涨，加之高企的抵押贷款利率，可能使潜在购房者继续观望，即便特朗普政府正采取措施解决住房可负担性问题。【原文：U.S. single-family house prices accelerated in November, which combined with high mortgage rates could keep potential homeowners on the sidelines even as the Trump administration takes steps to ​address the issue of housing affordability.】

item.title: Cloudflare股价飙升，病毒式传播的人工智能代理概念推高市场预期
item.description: 周二盘前交易中，Cloudflare股价飙升约14%，因社交媒体上围绕"Clawdbot"人工智能代理的热议，重新点燃了投资者对该公司技术运营工具的热情。【原文：Cloudflare shares surged about 14% premarket on Tuesday as social media buzz around the "Clawdbot" AI agent rekindled investor ​enthusiasm for the company's tools that help run ‌the technology.】

item.title: 《大空头》投资人巴里押注GameStop的五大启示
item.description: 迈克尔·伯里披露了其在电子游戏零售商GameStop的持仓，同时淡化了再次出现重大逼空行情的可能性，并将该公司首席执行官瑞安·科恩比作传奇投资者沃伦·巴菲特。【原文：Michael Burry has disclosed a position in videogame retailer GameStop , playing down the odds of another major short squeeze and likening its CEO, Ryan Cohen, to legendary investor Warren Buffett.】

item.title: 食品分销商赛斯高上调年度利润预期，因美国业务表现强劲
item.description: 食品分销商赛斯科周二上调了年度利润预期，其第二季度利润和销售额均超出市场预期。由于对牛排、鱼片和冷冻食品的强劲需求，该公司美国业务持续复苏。【原文：Food distributor Sysco lifted its annual profit forecast and beat estimates for both second-quarter profit and sales on Tuesday, as strong demand for its steaks, fillets and frozen-food products helped the company's U.S. business continue its recovery.】

item.title: UPS首席财务官称，2026年将裁减多达3万个运营岗位
item.description: 联合包裹服务公司首席财务官布莱恩·戴克斯在财报电话会议上表示，该公司计划在2026年前裁减多达3万个运营岗位。【原文：United Parcel Service plans to cut up to 30,000 operational roles in 2026, CFO Brian Dykes said on the company's post-earnings conference call.】

item.title: 波音与以色列理工学院携手开发可持续航空燃料，航空业正为实现2050年目标而努力
item.description: 波音公司与以色列理工学院周二宣布，双方正着手开发可持续航空燃料（SAF），原料包括绿色氢气和二氧化碳，旨在推动航空业的长期发展。【原文：Boeing and Israel's Technion university said on Tuesday they were beginning to develop Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) from feedstocks including green hydrogen and carbon dioxide to enable the aviation sector's long-term growth.】

item.title: CBS新闻主管将公布应对所谓偏见及收视下滑的对策方案
item.description: CBS新闻总编辑巴里·韦斯定于周二首次向CBS新闻编辑部揭晓其战略规划。这位前评论记者兼企业家正致力于扩大"蒂芙尼网络"的受众规模，并向全国证明该媒体已摆脱自由派偏见。【原文：CBS News Editor-In-Chief Bari Weiss is scheduled to unveil her strategy to the CBS newsroom for the first time on Tuesday, as the former opinion journalist and entrepreneur seeks to grow the Tiffany Network’s audience and convince the nation that it is free from liberal bias.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称哈萨克斯坦腾吉兹油田产量预计在2月7日前恢复不足半数
item.description: 据两位知情人士向路透社透露，哈萨克斯坦最大的油田——腾吉斯油田——在经历火灾和停电后正缓慢恢复生产，预计到2月7日其产量恢复水平将不足正常水平的一半。【原文：Kazakhstan's biggest oilfield, Tengiz, is likely to have restored less than half of its normal production by February 7 as it slowly recovers from a fire and power outage, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 英特利亚获FDA批准重启基因疗法试验，此前因安全问题暂停试验
item.description: 英特利亚治疗公司周二表示，美国药品监管机构已解除对其一项后期基因疗法试验的临床暂停令，允许该公司恢复针对罕见神经疾病的实验性药物测试。【原文：Intellia Therapeutics said on Tuesday that the U.S. drug regulator has lifted a clinical hold on one of its late-stage gene therapy trials, allowing the company to resume testing its experimental drug for a rare nerve disease.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，勒布的第三点资本计划在新一轮激进主义运动中瞄准CoStar
item.description: 对冲基金Third Point将发起三年来的首次激进行动，试图迫使Apartments.com和Homes.com的母公司CoStar Group更换董事会成员并重组业务。据相关文件及两位知情人士透露。【原文：With its first activist campaign in three years, hedge fund Third Point will try to force CoStar Group , the owner ​of Apartments.com and Homes.com, to change board directors and restructure operations, according to a document and two people familiar with the ‌matter.】

item.title: 美泰推出全新"K-Pop驱魔人"玩偶系列，旨在延长品牌生命周期
item.description: 美泰公司周二向《KPop驱魔人》粉丝们展示了将于今年晚些时候推出的全新玩偶阵容，此前该公司未能在假日购物季借势这部Netflix爆红剧集的成功获利。【原文：Mattel teased fans of "KPop Demon Hunters" on Tuesday with a new line-up of dolls to be rolled out later this year after it failed to cash in on the success of the runaway Netflix hit over the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空季度亏损扩大，经济舱需求疲软
item.description: 捷蓝航空周二公布的第四季度亏损额超出预期，主要受经济舱需求疲软拖累，导致该航空公司股价在盘前交易中下跌逾4%。【原文：JetBlue Airways on Tuesday posted a bigger-than-expected loss for the fourth quarter hurt by muted demand for economy ​seats, sending the carrier's shares down more than ‌4% in premarket trade.】

item.title: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司季度利润上升
item.description: 联合太平洋铁路公司周二报告称，第四季度利润增长近7%，得益于更坚挺的定价和更高的货运收入。【原文：Union Pacific reported nearly a 7% rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by firmer pricing and higher freight revenue.】

item.title: Pinterest裁员近15%以将资源转向人工智能领域
item.description: Pinterest周二宣布，将裁减不到15%的员工并缩减办公空间，这家社交媒体公司正将资源重新分配至人工智能项目。【原文：Pinterest ​said on Tuesday ‌it would reduce its workforce by less than 15% and shrink office ‌space, as the social ​media company reallocates resources to artificial intelligence initiatives.】

item.title: 据CNBC报道，Meta达成协议，将向康宁支付最高60亿美元用于采购光纤电缆。
item.description: 据CNBC周二报道，Facebook母公司Meta Platforms已与大猩猩玻璃制造商康宁达成协议，将在2030年前为其人工智能数据中心的光纤电缆支付最高60亿美元。【原文：Facebook parent Meta Platforms has signed a deal to pay Gorilla Glass maker Corning ​up to $6 billion through 2030 for fiber-optic cables in ‌its AI data centers, CNBC reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: NextEra季度利润超预期，美国电力需求激增
item.description: NextEra Energy周二公布的第四季度利润略高于华尔街预期，这得益于其佛罗里达州受监管公用事业业务的稳定增长，以及可再生能源和电池储能新增装机创纪录的一年——当时全美电力需求激增。【原文：NextEra Energy's narrowly beat Wall Street estimates for ​fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by steady ‌growth at its regulated Florida utility and a record year for renewable energy and battery storage additions, as electricity demand surges across the ‌United States.】

item.title: 波音公司第四季度扭亏为盈，得益于业务部门出售及交付量提升
item.description: 波音公司周二宣布扭亏为盈，实现第四季度盈利。这一成绩得益于其导航软件服务供应商的出售，以及喷气式飞机产量上升和交付量增长。【原文：Boeing swung to a fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by the sale of its navigation software services provider, as well as rising jet output and stronger deliveries.】

item.title: 英国宣布成立由Meta支持的人工智能团队以提升公共服务
item.description: 英国政府周二表示，已组建一支人工智能专家团队，利用Meta提供的资金开发人工智能工具，以提升交通运输、公共安全和国防领域的能力。【原文：The British government said on Tuesday it had recruited a team of artificial intelligence specialists to build AI tools to improve transport, public safety and defence, using funding from Meta .】

item.title: 荷兰法院裁定优步司机可被视为自雇人士
item.description: 荷兰法院周二推翻了2021年一项将所有优步司机归类为雇员的裁决，指出个体司机可被视为独立经营者。【原文：A Dutch court on Tuesday overturned a 2021 ruling that had classified all Uber drivers as employees, stating that individual drivers can be treated as independent entrepreneurs.】

item.title: 美国航空公司预测2026年利润将超预期，得益于高端需求强劲
item.description: 美国航空周二预测2026年盈利将超出分析师预期，得益于商务旅行的复苏以及对高利润高端服务的强劲需求。【原文：American Airlines forecast 2026 profit above analysts' expectations ​on Tuesday, buoyed by a recovery ‌in corporate travel and strong demand for high-margin premium services.】

item.title: HCA医疗集团预测2026年利润将超预期，因医疗需求旺盛
item.description: HCA医疗集团周二发布财报称，得益于强劲的医疗需求，其季度盈利超出预期。该公司同时预测2026年利润将高于华尔街预期。【原文：HCA Healthcare on Tuesday forecast its profit for 2026 above Wall Street estimates after reporting better-than-expected quarterly earnings on robust medical care demand.】

item.title: 随着美国航空在芝加哥奥黑尔机场的竞争加剧，美联航正加大该机场的航班运力。
item.description: 美联航周二公布了芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场有史以来规模最大的夏季航班时刻表，加剧了其与美国航空在全美第三大城市争夺登机口和高票价乘客的竞争。【原文：United Airlines on Tuesday unveiled its biggest-ever summer schedule at Chicago O'Hare International Airport, escalating its battle with American Airlines for gates and higher-fare passengers in the third-biggest U.S. city.】

item.title: 受强劲发动机需求和飞机维修业务推动，RTX季度销售额实现增长
item.description: 航空航天与国防巨头RTX周二公布第四季度营收和利润双双增长，主要得益于其发动机销售额上升以及对商用飞机维护和维修服务的需求旺盛。【原文：Aerospace and defense giant RTX posted a higher fourth-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, driven by a rise in sales for its engines and a strong appetite for commercial aircraft maintenance and repair services.】

item.title: 英国监管机构启动对人工智能影响零售金融的评估
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局周二启动一项审查，旨在评估先进人工智能对零售金融市场及消费者的影响。【原文：The UK's Financial Conduct Authority on Tuesday launched a review into the impact of advanced artificial intelligence on retail financial markets and consumers.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普·格鲁曼季度利润攀升，地缘政治不确定性推升需求
item.description: 航空航天与国防供应商诺斯罗普·格鲁曼公司周二公布第四季度利润和营收双双增长，其航空业务在强劲销售的推动下表现亮眼，而当前地缘政治不确定性持续升温。【原文：Aerospace and defense supplier Northrop Grumman posted higher fourth-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, helped by strong sales in its aeronautics business amid heightened geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: 金佰利·克拉克因削减成本及必需品需求强劲，盈利超预期
item.description: 金佰利·克拉克公司周二公布的季度利润超出预期，这得益于成本控制以及其产品（包括好奇纸尿裤和洁妮丝纸巾）需求的稳定。【原文：Kimberly-Clark exceeded quarterly profit expectations on Tuesday, helped by cost controls and steady demand for its products including Huggies ​diapers and Kleenex tissues.】

item.title: 通用汽车核心利润因SUV和皮卡需求增长而上升
item.description: 通用汽车周二公布第四季度核心利润增长，得益于全年经济型跨界SUV和皮卡销量强劲，这家底特律汽车制造商的股价在盘前交易中上涨约6%。【原文：General Motors reported a higher fourth-quarter core profit on Tuesday on stronger ​sales of its affordable crossover SUVs and pickup trucks through the ‌year, sending the shares of the Detroit automaker up about 6% in premarket trading.】
